name: Homepage Load Time
description: Verify the homepage loads within an acceptable timeframe.
steps: Open a web browser.
Enter 'google.com' in the address bar.
Press Enter.
expected_result: The homepage loads completely within 3 seconds.

name: Search Functionality - Valid Input
description: Verify the search functionality returns relevant results for a valid search query.
steps: Enter a valid search term (e.g., 'artificial intelligence') in the search bar.
Press Enter or click the search button.
expected_result: Search results page displays relevant results related to 'artificial intelligence'.

name: Search Functionality - Empty Input
description: Verify the search functionality handles empty search queries gracefully.
steps: Leave the search bar empty.
Press Enter or click the search button.
expected_result: The website displays a message indicating that a search term is required, or returns a default search page.

name: Search Functionality - Special Characters
description: Verify the search functionality handles special characters in the search query.
steps: Enter a search term containing special characters (e.g., '!@#$%^&*()') in the search bar.
Press Enter or click the search button.
expected_result: The website either returns relevant results, displays an error message indicating invalid characters, or sanitizes the input and performs the search.

name: Image Display
description: Verify images on the homepage are displayed correctly.
steps: Inspect the images on the homepage.
expected_result: All images are displayed correctly without broken links or loading errors.

name: Link Navigation
description: Verify all links on the homepage navigate to the correct pages.
steps: Click on each link on the homepage.
Observe the destination page.
expected_result: Each link navigates to the expected page without errors.

name: Browser Compatibility - Chrome
description: Verify the website displays correctly in the latest version of Chrome.
preconditions: Latest version of Chrome is installed.
steps: Open the website in Chrome.
Inspect the layout, fonts, and functionality.
expected_result: The website displays correctly without any layout issues, font rendering problems, or functional errors.

name: Browser Compatibility - Firefox
description: Verify the website displays correctly in the latest version of Firefox.
preconditions: Latest version of Firefox is installed.
steps: Open the website in Firefox.
Inspect the layout, fonts, and functionality.
expected_result: The website displays correctly without any layout issues, font rendering problems, or functional errors.

name: Mobile Responsiveness
description: Verify the website is responsive and displays correctly on different screen sizes.
preconditions: A browser with developer tools is available.
steps: Open the website in a browser.
Use the browser's developer tools to simulate different screen sizes (e.g., iPhone, iPad).
Inspect the layout, fonts, and functionality at each screen size.
expected_result: The website adapts to different screen sizes without any layout issues, overlapping elements, or functional errors.

name: Accessibility - Keyboard Navigation
description: Verify the website is navigable using only the keyboard.
steps: Use the Tab key to navigate through the website elements.
Use the Enter key to activate links and buttons.
expected_result: All interactive elements are accessible and navigable using the keyboard.

name: Security - SSL Certificate
description: Verify the website uses a valid SSL certificate.
steps: Check the address bar for a padlock icon.
Click on the padlock icon to view the certificate details.
expected_result: A valid SSL certificate is present and the connection is secure (HTTPS).

name: Performance - Page Size
description: Verify the page size is within acceptable limits for optimal performance.
preconditions: Browser with developer tools is available.
steps: Open the website in a browser.
Use the browser's developer tools to analyze the page size.
expected_result: The page size is less than 2MB.

name: Error Handling - 404 Page
description: Verify a custom 404 page is displayed when accessing a non-existent URL.
steps: Enter a non-existent URL (e.g., 'google.com/nonexistentpage') in the address bar.
Press Enter.
expected_result: A custom 404 error page is displayed, providing helpful information to the user.

name: Cookie Handling
description: Verify the website handles cookies correctly.
preconditions: Browser with developer tools is available.
steps: Open the website in a browser.
Use the browser's developer tools to inspect the cookies set by the website.
Clear the browser's cookies and reload the website.
expected_result: The website sets necessary cookies for functionality and respects user privacy settings.

name: JavaScript Functionality
description: Verify JavaScript functionality is working correctly.
preconditions: JavaScript is enabled in the browser.
steps: Inspect the website for any JavaScript-dependent features (e.g., dynamic content updates, animations).
Interact with these features.
expected_result: JavaScript-dependent features function as expected without errors.
